Normally $9.99/month, MrCheckpoint.com is offering SCMLA members 75% off!

Enter Promo Code: SCMLA249

Mr. Checkpoint is a messaging service that will alert subscribers to any DUI checkpoints within a 30-mile radius of a fixed address.
